title: SDSC SHAR Address
content:
SATISH DHAWAN SPACE CENTRE SHAR
SRIHARIKOTA RANGE P.O., SPSR NELLORE DISTRICT, ANDHRA PRADESH 524124

title: How to Reach SDSC SHAR
content: Nearest Town: Sullurupeta (Chennai-Kolkata NH-5). Distances: 83 km from Chennai, 96 km from Nellore, 79 km from Tirupati.
